job_description:
Must Haves

RPA/Client Power Automate Experience
Demonstrated experience in developing, testing, and implementing complex system solutions using Microsoft Power Automate Robotics Process Automation (RPA), Machine Learning (Client) platform, and Process Mining Technologies.
Demonstrated experience and skills in using Power Automate flows cloud and desktop flows, UI Interface, AI builder/ Form Recognizer Client models, and leveraging accelerators and connectors to build end-to-end RPA/Client automation solutions.
Demonstrated experience in designing secure Restful/Soap APIs web services and microservices with Java/JEE, Spring Framework, SQL/NoSQL database,Message Queue, etc.
